ingredients.ingredient: 4 (5 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1 small onion, cut into long slices
1 small green bell pepper, cut into thin strips
1 (8 ounce) package fresh mushrooms, coarsely chopped

cookingTips: Marinate chicken for at least 30 minutes to allow teriyaki flavor to penetrate
Cook bacon until just crispy so it doesn't become bitter when melted
Top with cheese at the end and broil briefly to melt without drying out chicken
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This dish combines marinated chicken with sautéed vegetables and melted cheese. What's the best cooking method to ensure the chicken stays moist while the cheese melts and browns?
